sense.name: upper level bridge of two crossing highways
sense.commentary: OVERPASS[+entity][+artifact][+construction][+span][+navigable][+elevated][+upper_level][+roadway][+crossing] Note: also refers to where a highway crosses a railroad, or footpath over a road.
sense.examples: The new overpass outside of town has eased traffic congestion. A cloverleaf is a type of overpass. We can use the overpass to walk safely to the other side of the freeway.
